mapper.select: /*whiteMapper|selectNavAuthList*/ SELECT nm.nav_url AS navUrl ,an.auth_nm AS authNm FROM nav_menu nm LEFT OUTER JOIN auth_name an ON an.auth_nm_seq = nm.nav_auth_nm_seq
/*whiteMapper|selectSideAuthList*/ SELECT sm.side_url AS sideUrl ,an.auth_nm AS authNm FROM side_menu sm LEFT OUTER JOIN auth_name an ON an.auth_nm_seq = sm.side_auth_nm_seq
